history.narrative: Law 19-36, the “Distributed Generation Amendment Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-10, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 7, 2011, and July 12, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 9, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-151 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-36 became effective on October 20, 2011.
Editor’s Note For definitions of “SRCC” and “OML” found in subsection (a-1), see § 8-1773.01.
